title: #664, 1bd, 1ba, Bright Modern Luxury Home
map_address: 4200 S Othello St near MLK Way
posting_body: Use this link for more info:
This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 611 Sq.
Modern apartment living in South Seattle
Envision life just south of the city, where you can relax with all the amenities your urban-dwelling friends enjoy (and then some).
Days can start with a spin in the fitness center for you, and a romp in the dog run for your four-legged friend.
After that, hop on the lightrail just steps away for a quick commute downtown or work remotely from the modern co-working spaces right here at home.

Evenings and weekends can be spent in the theater, the game hall, the Sky Lounge that allows for entertaining in the chef’s kitchen or maybe the rooftop for grilling and dining al fresco with views of Mount Rainer and Lake Washington.
It’s the perfect environment for hosting, but also the ideal place to kick back and enjoy some you-time.
Othello Station is a residential hideaway just south of Seattle that is a commuter’s dream that keeps you connected with easy access to all Seattle has to offer.
While being just minutes from work or play in Downtown Seattle, it’s home to its own Light Rail stop (right next door) but just as close to parks and outdoor adventures.
Smack in the middle of the vibrant north Puget Sound, Assembly 118 connects you to the water, the woods, the shops, the eats and the bright city lights.
Restricted breeds: Rottweiler, Pitbull / American Staffordshire Terrier, Doberman, Cane Corsos
$300 Refundable Pet Deposit Due at Move
Combined income of 2.5 times the rent
Photos and/or floor plans shown are representational and may not depict the exact layout or features of the available unit.
If currently occupied, the individual unit you've selected may not be available to tour.
Please contact our leasing team with any questions.
